name: Broadcast Channel API
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none"><path d="M6.44 2h11.11C21.11 2 22 2.89 22 6.44v6.33c0 3.56-.89 4.44-4.44 4.44H6.44C2.89 17.22 2 16.33 2 12.78V6.44C2 2.89 2.89 2 6.44 2ZM12 17.22V22M2 13h20M7.5 22h9" stroke="#FFD23F" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg>
description: The Broadcast Channel API allows basic communication between browsing contexts (windows, tabs, frames, or iframes) and workers on the same origin.

projects.title: Dual-Window Presentation Tool
projects.description: Open a 'Remote' in one window and the 'Presentation' in another. Clicking the remote updates the presentation instantly.

projects.title: Cross-Tab Session Manager
projects.description: Implement a system where logging out in one tab instantly logs the user out in all other open tabs to prevent security issues.

projects.title: Global Media Controller
projects.description: Build a music player where pausing or skipping a track in one tab reflects the state change in all other open tabs.

name: Canvas API
description: The Canvas API provides a means for drawing graphics via JavaScript and the HTML <canvas> element. It is used for animation, game graphics, data visualization, photo manipulation, and real-time video processing.

resources.title: The Valley of Code Canvas Guide

projects.title: Meme Generator
projects.description: A starter project. Upload an image, render it to canvas, overlay custom text, and export the result as a PNG file.

projects.title: Interactive Particle System
projects.description: Create a physics simulation where thousands of small particles react to the mouse cursor (repel/attract) using `requestAnimationFrame`.

projects.title: Real-Time Whiteboard
projects.description: A shared drawing surface where multiple users can sketch simultaneously. Coordinates are synced via WebSockets or Broadcast Channel.

projects.title: Browser-Based Photo Editor
projects.description: manipulate image pixels directly (getImageData) to create filters like grayscale, sepia, or brightness adjustments without a server.

name: Document Picture-in-Picture API
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none"><path d="M22 10v5c0 5-2 7-7 7H9c-5 0-7-2-7-7V9c0-5 2-7 7-7h5" stroke="#FFD23F" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M22 10h-4c-3 0-4-1-4-4V2l8 8Z" stroke="#FFD23F" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg>
description: Unlike the standard PiP which only works for video, the Document PiP API allows you to open any HTML content (timers, notes, custom players) in a floating, always-on-top window.

projects.title: Always-On-Top Focus Timer
projects.description: A Pomodoro timer that floats over your other windows so you never lose track of time while working in other apps.

projects.title: Video Call Control Center
projects.description: Create a 'sidecar' window for video calls that keeps mute, camera toggle, and 'raise hand' buttons visible while you present from another tab.

projects.title: Mini Stock/Crypto Monitor
projects.description: A tiny floating dashboard that displays real-time price updates via WebSockets, allowing traders to watch charts while reading news.

projects.title: Research Scratchpad
projects.description: A floating note-taking window that stays open as you browse different documentation pages, preserving your notes across navigation.

projects.title: Mini Music Player
projects.description: A custom media player interface with lyrics and 'skip' controls that floats on top of your workflow.

name: EyeDropper API
description: The EyeDropper API provides a mechanism for creating an eyedropper tool that allows users to select colors from their screen, including outside the browser window.

projects.title: Universal Design Palette
projects.description: A tool for designers to grab colors from any website, desktop app, or system UI and save them to a local palette.

projects.title: Desktop Palette Generator
projects.description: Open a reference image in your OS photo viewer, then use the browser to sample multiple points and generate a CSS color scheme.

projects.title: Global Contrast Checker
projects.description: Pick a foreground color and a background color from anywhere on your screen to calculate their WCAG accessibility contrast ratio.

name: File System Access API
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none"><path d="M21 7v10c0 3-1.5 5-5 5H8c-3.5 0-5-2-5-5V7c0-3 1.5-5 5-5h8c3.5 0 5 2 5 5Z" stroke="#ffd23f" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M14.5 4.5v2c0 1.1.9 2 2 2h2M8 13h4M8 17h8" stroke="#ffd23f" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg>
description: This API allows interaction with files on the user's local device. It enables developers to build powerful apps that interact with other (non-Web) apps on the user's device.

projects.title: Browser-Based Code Editor
projects.description: Open a file (html, css, js) from your desktop, edit it with syntax highlighting in the browser, and save changes directly to the disk.

projects.title: Local Markdown Wiki
projects.description: Select a local folder containing multiple .md files. The app lists them in a sidebar and allows you to edit and auto-save notes (like Obsidian).

name: Geolocation API
description: The Geolocation API allows the user to provide their location to web applications if they so desire. For privacy reasons, the user is asked for permission to report location information.

projects.title: Hyper-Local Weather
projects.description: Detect the user's exact latitude and longitude on load to fetch and display the current weather forecast for their specific coordinates.

projects.title: GPS Scavenger Hunt
projects.description: A game where users must physically walk to specific real-world coordinates to 'unlock' the next clue or level.

name: MediaStream API
description: The Media Capture and Streams API relates to the manipulation of media streams, including requesting access to the microphone and camera.

projects.title: Browser Photo Booth
projects.description: Access the user's webcam, apply real-time CSS filters (sepia, grayscale) to the video feed, and capture high-quality snapshots.

projects.title: Real-Time QR Scanner
projects.description: Process video frames 60 times a second to detect and decode QR codes instantly without taking a picture.

projects.title: No-Install Screen Recorder
projects.description: Use `getDisplayMedia` to record the user's entire screen or a specific window and save the footage as a .webm file.

name: Web Crypto API
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none"><path d="M22 8.5a6.5 6.5 0 0 1-7.02 6.48 6.509 6.509 0 0 0-5.96-5.96A6.5 6.5 0 1 1 22 8.5Z" stroke="#ffd23f" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M15 15.5a6.5 6.5 0 1 1-13 0 6.5 6.5 0 0 1 13 0Z" stroke="#ffd23f" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M7.62 14.62 8.5 13l.88 1.62 1.62.88-1.62.88L8.5 18l-.88-1.62L6 15.5l1.62-.88Z" stroke="#ffd23f" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg>
description: The Web Crypto API provides a set of low-level cryptographic primitives to perform operations like hashing, signature generation, encryption, and decryption.

projects.title: True Random Password Gen
projects.description: Use `crypto.getRandomValues()` (instead of `Math.random`) to generate cryptographically strong passwords that are impossible to predict.

projects.title: File Checksum Calculator
projects.description: Calculate the SHA-256 hash of any uploaded file to verify its integrity and ensure it hasn't been tampered with.

projects.title: AES Message Encryptor
projects.description: Create a tool that encrypts text using a password (AES-GCM). The result is gibberish that can only be read with the correct password.

projects.title: Digital Signature Verifier
projects.description: Generate a public/private key pair. Sign a text document with the private key, and allow others to verify it using the public key.

projects.title: Zero-Knowledge Notes
projects.description: A notes app that encrypts data *before* saving it to LocalStorage, ensuring that even if the device is inspected, the notes remain unreadable.

name: Web MIDI API
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none"><path d="M19.26 18.9V7.1c0-1.5-.64-2.1-2.23-2.1h-1.04c-1.59 0-2.23.6-2.23 2.1v11.8M5.26 18.9v-6.8c0-1.5.64-2.1 2.23-2.1h1.04c1.59 0 2.23.6 2.23 2.1v6.8M2 19h20" stroke="#FFD23F" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg>
description: The Web MIDI API allows web applications to list, open, and communicate with MIDI devices like keyboards and synthesizers plugged into the computer.

projects.title: Piano Learning Game
projects.description: An app like 'Guitar Hero' for piano. It displays falling notes, and you must press the correct key on your physical MIDI keyboard to score points.

name: Web Share API
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none"><path d="M14.99 17.5h1.51c3.02 0 5.5-2.47 5.5-5.5 0-3.02-2.47-5.5-5.5-5.5h-1.51M9 6.5H7.5A5.51 5.51 0 0 0 2 12c0 3.02 2.47 5.5 5.5 5.5H9M8 12h8" stroke="#FFD23F" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg>
description: The Web Share API invokes the native sharing mechanism of the device, allowing users to share text, URLs, or files with other apps (like WhatsApp, Mail, or AirDrop).

projects.title: Viral Quote Card Generator
projects.description: Create a beautiful image from text on a canvas, convert it to a blob, and share it directly to Instagram or Twitter using the native share sheet.

projects.title: Video Timestamp Sharer
projects.description: A custom video player where clicking 'Share' generates a URL with the specific current timestamp (e.g., ?t=1m20s) and opens the share menu.

projects.title: Read Later Integration
projects.description: A news reader app that uses the Share API to send the current article URL to apps like Pocket, Notion, or Notes.

name: Web Speech API
icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none"><path d="M12 19c3.31 0 6-2.69 6-6V8c0-3.31-2.69-6-6-6S6 4.69 6 8v5c0 3.31 2.69 6 6 6Z" stroke="#ffd23f" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path><path d="M3 11v2a9 9 0 0 0 18 0v-2M9.11 7.48a8 8 0 0 1 5.5 0M10.03 10.48c1.2-.33 2.47-.33 3.67 0" stroke="#ffd23f" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path></svg>
description: The Web Speech API enables you to incorporate voice data into web apps. It has two parts: SpeechSynthesis (Text-to-Speech) and SpeechRecognition (Speech-to-Text).

projects.title: Voice-Controlled Task Manager
projects.description: A to-do list where you can add items by saying 'Add buy milk' and remove them by saying 'Delete buy milk'.

projects.title: Language Pronunciation Coach
projects.description: The app speaks a word in a foreign language (Synthesis), listens to you repeat it (Recognition), and grades your accuracy.

projects.title: Article Audiobook Mode
projects.description: Add a 'Listen' button to a blog post that reads the content aloud using a natural-sounding browser voice.

projects.title: Hands-Free Website Navigator
projects.description: Navigate a website using only voice commands like 'Scroll Down', 'Go Home', or 'Open Menu' for accessibility.

name: View Transitions API
description: This API provides a mechanism to easily create animated transitions between different DOM states, allowing simple websites to feel like native mobile apps.

projects.title: Seamless Photo Gallery
projects.description: A photo gallery where clicking a thumbnail smoothly expands (morphs) it into the full-screen version without a hard page cut.

projects.title: Circular Reveal Dark Mode
projects.description: Implement a dark mode toggle where the new theme expands from the button in a growing circle, covering the screen.

projects.title: Animated Page Transitions
projects.description: Create a multi-page site where navigating between pages uses smooth fade and slide animations instead of instant cuts.
